pages.text: For the process of creating $(l:general/onyx_shards)Black Shards$() you have developed a special construction.$(br)That said you are pretty sure you can get more use out of it later.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Can be built with Basalt or Calcite.$(br)Requires a focus structure and clear view of the sky.

You have designed the structure for the Fusion Shrine to bundle the magical energies of $(c_cyan)Matter$(), $(c_magenta)Time$() and $(c_yellow)Energy$() and focus them on a single, central point, the Fusion Shrine itself.

pages.name: Shrine Structure
pages.text: As always you are able to switch basalt with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks to your liking.
